messages.message: the main thought was not to force everyone into hot reloading if they don't want it

my personal opinion is that it's a great feature and we should force everyone locally to do it; however, if i'm not mistaken @Jess we still have to manually do make build-prod to generate the webpacked files for prod / dogfood etc
^ thatâ€™s my understanding, but we can certainly move to a system where build-prod happens as part of deployment. There are advantages/disadvantages to both styles..
